channel.title: It Is the Will of Corax
channel.description:
![image|690x364](upload://8XquCI30reI1JigFm37CM2GiwKa.jpg) Corax's Will
One time Use (but can be recharged if CW is dumb) - By the Will of Corax, from the shadows, and threw the darkness, command the mind of those you seek dead, make him do the forbidden, rid this world of this plague, die die die, by their own hand! :blush:

item.title: It Is the Will of Corax
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Yes but admit it. He needs Occupy immunity.

Read full topic
item.source: It Is the Will of Corax

item.title: It Is the Will of Corax

Read full topic

item.title: It Is the Will of Corax
item.dc:creator: Dooku
item.description:
Hell, we’re going to hell btw, tat’s what I meant. but pls no exe me.

Also you could srsly make it a passive or something, “If someone attacks you, invoke the ancient rite of Corax’s blood, take his soul to the depths of hell, together you die, die die die by their own hand.”

Invoker needs a passive still anyways.

Read full topic
item.source: It Is the Will of Corax

Drag this man to the port of execution.

Read full topic

item.title: It Is the Will of Corax
item.dc:creator: Insanity
item.description:
You break the law of creating classes/changing class of Throne of Lies:

No more than 2 day, night, and passive ability.
